case_circumstances: This person passed out at an AA meeting in Riverside, CA.  He was transported to a local hospital where he expired the following day without regaining consciouness.  A person at the AA meeting stated that the decedent was a street person and went by the name "Taquachi".  Exhaustive investigation has been unable to establish his identity or locate any family.
case_head_hair: His hair was straight , combed over to the side, and was about 3" in length.  His hair was unkempt
case_facial_hair: He had a mustache and beard which was not trimmed and looked to be a growth of about one month
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_with_body: Purple denim 3/4 length shorts (Rodin), unknown size, tied with a string. Large gray T-shirt with the "Jurassic Park" logo.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
